name: Ratastrophe
description: A chaotic plague rat carrying vials of toxic concoctions. Its unpredictable nature and mastery of poisons makes it a dangerous opponent that slowly weakens foes over time.

ability.name: Toxic Aura
ability.description: All attacks have a 40% chance to poison the target. Poisoned enemies take 15% max HP damage each turn instead of the usual 12.5%

moves.name: Toxic Spike
moves.description: Strikes with a poisonous spike. Always poisons the target.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.description: Hurls filthy sludge at the target. High chance to poison.

moves.name: Plague Bite
moves.description: A diseased bite that spreads poison. Damage increases if target is already poisoned.

moves.name: Toxic Overload
moves.description: Badly poisons all enemies and doubles all existing poison damage for 3 turns.

habitat: Sewers, abandoned laboratories, and toxic wastelands
